alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chambers, south central Liberty and east central Harris Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mont Belvieu, or 10 miles east of Barrett, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baytown, Beach City, Highlands, Barrett, Mont Belvieu, Old River-Winfree, Cove, Morgan`s Point and Wallisville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
